summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average was just below the flat line . The S&P 500 (^GSPC) rose nearly 0.5%, closing at an all-time high of 6,277.42 . The Nasdaq Composite (^IXIC) also hit a record high of 20,393.13 . Apple (AAPL) stock rose after an upgrade from Jefferies (JEF) analysts .  ADP data showed US private employers unexpectedly cut 33,000 jobs in the month . It was the first month of job losses in the private sector in over two years . The data lays the ground for the release of the June US jobs report on Thursday .  The Dow Jones Industrial Average (^DJI) was just below the flat line . The S&P 500 (^GSPC) rose nearly 0.5%, closing at an all-time high of 6,277.42 . The Nasdaq Composite (^IXIC) also hit a record close at 20,393.13 . The June jobs report is expected to show hiring slowed while the unemployment rate moved higher .  Economists expect nonfarm payrolls to have risen by 110,000 in June and the unemployment rate to have moved up to 4.3%, according to Bloomberg . In May, the US economy added 139,000 jobs . The unemployment rate held flat at 4.2% .  Research from Exhibit A co-founder Matt Cerminaroshows both the Tech and Communication Services sectors fell more than 22% from their most recent high at some point this year . Both sectors now among the best performers of the year .  Robinhood's European app transitions from a crypto-only app to a broader offering where customers can invest in stocks and ETFs . Wall Street is bullish on the stock, with Bernstein analysts noting Robinhood now forms 30% of US retail crypto trading revenues .  Google Cloud "has an architecture advantage" because of its access to in-house AI chips, Luria says . Shares of Google Cloud as a standalone stock would trade at $56 per share . Google Cloud expected to generate $ 55bn of revenue this year .  President Trump took to his social media platform to share that he "made a Trade Deal with Vietnam" Nike (NKE), On Holding (ONON), Deckers (DECK), and Lululemon (LULU) spiked in immediate response to the news . Shares of ON were up more than 3.5% to lead the rally among footwear names .  CEO Lip-Bu Tan has said that Intel's 18A process is losing its appeal with customers . So far, Amazon and Microsoft have signed on to build their own chips using the process . But Tan would instead like to focus on 14A, the manufacturing technology that Intel has developed .  President Trump announced a trade deal with Vietnam, lifting investor sentiment that more agreements could come before the July 9 tariff-pause deadline . Investors have been closely watching developments on the trade front as July 9 approaches .  Insurance stocks dropped across the board Wednesday following the passage of Trump's "big, beautiful" tax and spending bill . UnitedHealth (UNH) fell nearly 3%, while Aetna parent company CVS Health (CVS) dropped over 2% . The bill would slash federal spending on Medicaid and Affordable Care Act marketplaces by about $1 trillion . It would leave almost 12 million people without insurance by 2034, NPR reported .  Apple stock climbed about 1% Wednesday morning after an upgrade from Jefferies . Jefferies analyst Edison Lee said global iPhone sales rose 15% in April and May . Lee estimated that iPhone sales in China grew 19% in that period, partly due to targeted discounts and government subsidies .  Apple shares jump 1.3% Tuesday after Bloomberg report that the iPhone maker is considering using AI technology from startups Anthropic and OpenAI to power a new version of Siri . Nvidia (NVDA) stock continued to retreat from its record high of $157.99 on Monday .  The S&P 500 Index (^GSPC) has been down since May . The index has been on a downward streak since March 2023 . Apple (AAPL), Tesla (TSLA) and Alphabet (GOOG,GOOGL) are hurting the index .  Tesla is expected to report another quarter of declining global deliveries on Wednesday . Sales for June have dropped for a sixth straight month in France, Sweden, Denmark and Italy . Zuckerberg is on anaggressive recruitment drive to poach top AI researchers and engineers .  Centene (CNC) tumbled over 25% in premarket trading after the healthcare insurerwithdrew its financial guidance for 2025, warning that its earnings will fall far short of expectations . Centene said recent data showed that fewer people were enrolling in Medicaid and Affordable Care Act marketplaces .  Centene Corporation (CNC) drops 26% in premarket trading after withdrawing its financial guidance for 2025, warning that earnings will fall short of expectations . Wall Street had previously estimated adjusted EPS of $7.28 .  Intel (INTC) stock fell 1% in premarket trading following the new chief executive's plan to exploring a big change to its contract manufacturing business . If implemented, the new strategy for what Intel calls its "foundry" business would entail no longer marketing certain chipmaking technology to external customers .  S&P/ASX 200 (^AXJO) hit a record high of 4009.15 points as of 00:20 (UTC-4) The move saw the index crossing past the 4000 threshold for the second time on record . Australia and Hong Kong led gains as the benchmark Nikkei 225 (^N225) slipped 0.7% .

Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has lost 14.7% year-to-date on the back of concerns about the firm’s China supply chain and market opinions about its AI products . Cramer has continued to defend the stock throughout 2025 . He believes that the firm's product quality is unparalleled in the market .  Some AI stocks hold greater promise for delivering higher returns and have limited downside risk . Ian Rogers, chief experience officer at Ledger, celebrated the Senate’s passage of the GENIUS Act and its promise of clearstablecoin regulation . Rogers noted that stablecoins are “really low hanging fruit” given the billions already in circulation .  Rogers foresees non-crypto companies building their backends entirely on crypto rails . “That technology is here, it’s been here a long time,” he said . He urged users to adopt hardware wallets and two-factor solutions like Ledgerto .  Former Apple exec has one word response to new regulation: “Stablecoins” form of stored value and stablecoins across many websites on the internet .

Foxconn has quietly pulled back hundreds of Chinese engineers from its iPhone plants in southern India . Move could throw a wrench into Apple's fast-tracked diversification plans . Move comes as Beijing steps up pressure to keep high-value technology and skilled labor inside China .  Apple's goal to make most US-bound iPhones in India by late 2026 now looks less straightforward . India has gone from assembling a few iPhones to producing roughly 20% of global output in just four years . China's curbs on exporting skilled engineers would make setting up assembly lines stateside even tougher .  Apple's supply chain pivot could take longerand cost more than originally hoped . Apple's supplier chain pivot may take longer and cost more to Apple than initially hoped .

Shares of the AI chipmaker rose more than 2% to give the company a market cap of $3.92 trillion . Apple's value has dropped since then as it struggles to catch up to its Big Tech peers on AI .  Wedbush analyst Dan Ives expects Nvidia to hit a $4 trillion market capitalization this summer and potentially $5 trillion over the next 18 months . Other market watchers are more skeptical about the AI boom .  Chanos: “We’re not there yet yet, but that’s one of the risks out there that I think a lot of people are underestimating,” Chanos said . Chanos says disappointing revenues and earnings forecast "will immediately show up"
